price: (25) He said, "Therein you will live, and therein you will die, and from it you will be brought forth."
arabic: قَالَ فِيهَا تَحۡيَوۡنَ وَفِيهَا تَمُوتُونَ وَمِنۡهَا تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla fīhā taḥyawna wafīhā tamūtūna wamin'hā tukh'rajūna
